original_text: then the priest shall go and look. And if the disease has spread in the house, it is a persistent leprous disease in the house; it is unclean.
korean_text: 제사장은 또 가서 살펴볼 것이요 그 색점이 만일 집에 퍼졌으면 악성 나병인즉 이는 부정하니

sentences.original_text: then the priest shall go and look.
And if the disease has spread in the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그 병이 집 안에 퍼졌다면

sentences.original_text: it is a persistent leprous disease in the house
